article_title: Deadly Israeli strikes reported in Rafah after four soldiers killed
sentence: Four  Israeli  soldiers  have  been  killed  in  a  Hamas  rocket  attack  near  one  of  the  main  crossings  used  to  deliver  aid  into  Gaza,  Israel  has  said.

article_title: Deadly Israeli strikes reported in Rafah after four soldiers killed
sentence: Subsequent  Israeli  strikes  in  the  southern  Gazan  city  of  Rafah  have  reportedly  killed  at  least  12  people.

article_title: Deadly Israeli strikes reported in Rafah after four soldiers killed
sentence: There  were  two  Israeli  strikes  on  Sunday,  killing  at  least  12  people  according  to  Gaza  health  officials.

article_title: Deadly Israeli strikes reported in Rafah after four soldiers killed
sentence: The  war  began  after  waves  of  Hamas  gunmen  stormed  across  Gaza's  border  into  Israel  on  7  October,  killing  about  1,200  people  and  taking  more  than  250  hostages.

article_title: Deadly Israeli strikes reported in Rafah after four soldiers killed
sentence: During  the  subsequent  Israeli  military  campaign  in  Gaza,  more  than  34,600  Palestinians  have  been  killed  and  over  77,900  wounded,  according  to  figures  from  the  territory's  Hamas-run  health  ministry.

article_title: Deadly Israeli strikes reported in Rafah after four soldiers killed
sentence: Update  7  May  2024:  The  number  of  soldiers  killed  in  the  Hamas  rocket  attack  has  been  updated  in  this  article  from  three  to  four.
